Arch Fry Dispenser
■Take out the
potatoes. Open
the top of the
bag.

Arch Fry Dispenser
■Put the potato
bag in the hopper
and pour it into
the dispenser
slowly.

Arch Fry Dispenser
■Put next potato
bag in the other
direction. Now
cover the hopper.

Arch Fry Dispenser
■Set the amount to put in
the basket.

Arch Fry Dispenser
■Set the basket on the upper
guide. The potatoes will be
basketed in preset intervals.
